review.title: “Good company but too political.”
review.pros: Pros – Pro employee values through the company`s guiding principles. Tries to enable decisions at the point of impact, but then allows politics to keep real change from happening.
review.cons: Cons – Consensus management makes decision making very slow and painful. The Sr Leadership team hesitates to make decisions and as a result has kept the company from meeting its potential.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The owner and current President needs to get out to the various sites and meet with his employees. If he is too shy to lead, he should hire a new President quickly so the company can move forward.

review.title: “Greene Tweed Review”
review.pros: Pros – - Profitable company- Privately owned- Good benefits
review.cons: Cons – - A lot of internal problems- Poor senior management
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Understand the market, trends, needs, and be proactive instead of reactive. Get a board of directors.
